doc:
Tony Briggs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Briggs 0 Tony Briggs (born 3 July 1967) is an Australian actor, writer and producer. He was a former track and field athlete. He may be best known for creating the stage play The Sapphires (later a 2012 film) telling the real story of an Aboriginal singing group, including his mother and aunt, who toured Vietnam during the war. Tony_Briggs ( born 3_July_1967 ) is an_Australian_actor_,_writer_and_producer . He was a_former_track_and_field_athlete . He may_be_best_known for creating the_stage_play The_Sapphires ( later_a_2012_film_) telling the_real_story of an_Aboriginal_singing_group , including his_mother_and_aunt , who toured Vietnam during the_war .
